<1> The red book cover displays the title “Sânziana și Pepelea” by Vasile Alecsandri, published by Aldo Press, with a white sticker showing catalog number 821.135.1 A36 in the top-left corner.  
<2> The author’s name, Vasile Alecsandri, is prominently featured in large yellow Gothic-style lettering within a decorative gold-bordered rectangle near the top of the cover.  
<3> Below the author’s name, the title “Sânziana și Pepelea” is rendered in bold white Gothic-style font, centered and slightly smaller than the author’s name, creating a visual hierarchy.  
<4> The publisher’s imprint, “ALDO PRESS,” appears at the bottom center in a minimalist black rectangular box with white uppercase text, offering clear branding.  
<5> The cover’s deep red background contrasts sharply with the white and yellow typography, ensuring readability while conveying a classic, literary aesthetic appropriate for Romanian poetry.  
<final>The red book cover features Vasile Alecsandri’s “Sânziana și Pepelea,” published by Aldo Press, with a white catalog sticker (821.135
